column3: Hey Alonso! Can you tell yer mother I started work on that new poncho of yers?
Just a poncho huh? That must be why you destroyed the first three I made you.(chuckles)
(chuckling) (looks toward Alonso) So you didn’t tell her about the poncho you borrowed from me lastweek?
Nothing Ms.Zinnia! I’ll go tell mom about the progress. Goodbye.
